healthcare.text: Healthcare access in Javea reflects the municipality's maturity and international demographic. Hospital de Dénia operates as the primary acute care facility with 24-hour emergency services, located 15 minutes by vehicle. Clinica Benidorm, positioned 30 minutes distant, provides alternative acute care options. The community supports numerous private medical practices with English-speaking practitioners specialising in areas serving international residents—general medicine, dermatology, orthopaedics, and cardiology. Pharmacy services are widely available with English-language consultation standard. Many international residents maintain dual healthcare arrangements, combining Spanish national system access with private insurance providing expedited service and practitioner choice.

faqs.question: Can non-EU citizens purchase this property?
faqs.answer: Yes. Non-EU citizens can purchase property in Spain with appropriate documentation and a Spanish fiscal identification number (NIE).
